Most people have probably never seen her in anything.

And rifftrax is awesome, not only do Mike, Bill and Kevin continue their holy work of making bad movies funny, they get to tackle movies they never would have been able to before. Trust me, their commentary is the only possible way to make the Transformers films watchable.
